item.title: Teaching Material: PHY3012/Plasticity in the visual system in development
item.description: Interesting A man with only half a brain A study of a man who recovered vision after decades of being blind: Fine et al. (2003) Long-term deprivation affects visual perception and cortex. Nat. Neurosci. 6, p915. How Utter Darkness Could Heal Lazy Eye: related to ocular dominance critical period. Giving blind people sight illuminates the brainâ€™s secrets General review Anderson et al (2011) Do children really recover better?
